name: GenesisApps
short: Eases the application process for the Genesis server
description: Adds tools to ease the application process for the Genesis server. This includes Wufoo form integration and a customizable application checklist
end_user_data_statement: This cog reposts images, messages, and join/leave dates in channels setup by the server admins
install_msg: GenesisApps has been installed! Check out the help ([p]help GenesisApps) for more information.
author: chovin (irdumb)
